# Expected patterns in generated report (regex patterns)

# Header section
^# Repository Activity Report: .+$
^\*\*Repository\*\*: \[.+\]\(.+\)$
^\*\*Period\*\*: .+ to .+$
^\*\*Report Generated\*\*: .+ UTC$

# Summary Statistics section
^## Summary Statistics$
^- Total Commits: \d+$
^- Total Authors: \d+$
^- Open Pull Requests: \d+$
^- Open Issues: \d+$
^- Closed Issues: \d+$

# Overall AI Summary section
^## ðŸ“Š Overall Summary$

# Branch sections
^## ðŸŒ¿ Branch: .+$
^### AI Summary$
^### Statistics$
^- Total Commits: \d+$
^- Lines Added: \+\d+$
^- Lines Deleted: -\d+$
^### Commits$

# Commit entries
^#### \[.+\]\(.+\)$
^\*\*Author\*\*: \[.+\]\(.+\) \| \*\*Date\*\*: \d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2} \d{2}:\d{2}$
^\*\*Changes\*\*: \+\d+ / -\d+ lines$

# Pull Requests section
^## ðŸ”€ Open Pull Requests$
^### \[PR #\d+: .+\]\(.+\)$
^\*\*Author\*\*: \[.+\]\(.+\)$
^\*\*Created\*\*: \d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}$
^\*\*Status\*\*: .+$
^\*\*Comments\*\*: \d+$
^\*\*Reviews\*\*: \d+$
^#### AI Summary$

# Issues section
^## ðŸ“‹ Open Issues$
^### \[Issue #\d+: .+\]\(.+\)$
^## âœ… Closed Issues$

# Code Reviews section
^## ðŸ‘€ Code Reviews$
^\*\*Total Reviews\*\*: \d+$

# Author Activity section
^## ðŸ‘¥ Author Activity$
^### \[.+\]\(.+\)$
^#### Overall Statistics$
^- Total Commits: \d+$
^- Total Lines Added: \+\d+$
^- Total Lines Deleted: -\d+$
^#### Activity by Branch$

# Footer
^---$
^Generated by gh-repomon$
